name: Collective Equity Ownership
description:
A London based collective equity fund led by entrepreneurs 

Dedicated to those with all their eggs in one basket 

Enabling diversification of shares without giving up ownership

team.name: Archimede Mulas
team.bioHtml: Naval Engineering background, and now working for a startup which provides a new form of insurance for business owners.

jobs.title: Investor Analyst
jobs.description: Job consists of undertaking a financial and quantitative analysis of the performance of late-stage VCs  which have invested in Series A+ UK companies.
jobs.descriptionHtml: Job consists of undertaking a financial and quantitative analysis of the performance of late-stage VCs which have invested in Series A+ UK companies.

jobs.title: Investment Principal
jobs.description:
Looking to hire an investment principal for CEO's new UK-based secondary fund.
Has to have experience in fundraising and in investing directly in Series A+ companies.
Very important to be extremely passionate about the Venture ecosystem and wanting to disrupt the current private equity models.
